REPORT.title: Billy McFarland Sells Fyre Festival Brand on Ebay for $245,300
REPORT.summary: Billy McFarland, the disgraced concert promoter behind the infamous Fyre Festival fiasco, has finally thrown in the towel, selling the Fyre Festival brand on eBay for $245,300 after seven years of failed attempts that landed him in prison and a $26 million legal judgment, effectively putting an end to his ill-fated dream of hosting a high-end music festival in the Bahamas....
